summary: This document is an email forwarded by Mark L. Epstein to the FBI on May 26, 2020, containing a forwarded message from Mark L. Epstein to Stacey Richman dated May 24, 2020. The forwarded message includes threatening text messages directed at Mark L. Epstein, referencing his brother and containing a threat.

keyFacts: Mark L. Epstein received threatening text messages on May 24, 2020, which stated 'You will diiiie like your brother' and 'Look behind you.'
Mark L. Epstein forwarded these threatening messages to the FBI on May 26, 2020.
The threats reference Mark L. Epstein's brother, implying a connection to his brother's death or situation.
